scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && cd apps/* && rm -rf node_modules && yarn
scripts.build:dev:ios: cd apps/mobile && eas build --profile development --platform ios
scripts.build:dev:android: cd apps/mobile && eas build --profile development --platform android
scripts.build:staging:ios: cd apps/mobile && eas build --profile staging --platform ios
scripts.build:staging:android: cd apps/mobile && eas build --profile staging --platform android
scripts.build:beta:ios: cd apps/mobile && eas build --profile beta --platform ios
scripts.build:beta:android: cd apps/mobile && eas build --profile beta --platform android
scripts.build:prod:ios: cd apps/mobile && eas build --profile production --platform ios
scripts.build:prod:android: cd apps/mobile && eas build --profile production --platform android
scripts.ota:dev: cd apps/mobile && expo publish --release-channel development --target managed
scripts.ota:staging: cd apps/mobile && expo publish --release-channel staging --target managed
scripts.ota:beta: cd apps/mobile && expo publish --release-channel beta --target managed
scripts.ota:prod: cd apps/mobile && expo publish --release-channel production --target managed
